TopicTitle: Save / Load Bug - ALl pieces in ground and seperated

Articles.Content:
Hey folks, I just encountered a bug in which all my parts are below the ground and disassembled:

It happend after I build the rocket in one go and saved it. Later I loaded it and it was broken. During editing and after saving everything still looked fine. But the save seems to be messed up (see below)

The problem is, that I cannot just click the rocket and move it up, all the parts are no longer joint together.,

 

The file to my spacecraft (in this mode) is zipped on the link below:

https://file.io/4ow66BJUQ9tl

Cheers,

Syr

 

PS: Cost me 3 hours of "work" to rebuild that thing

PS2: The game LAGS when the Parts Manager is active on big rockets

Edited February 25, 2023 by Syr
